title: Dust Event Detection and Trajectory Analysis in Tokamak Plasma Videos
description: Developed a computer vision pipeline to detect and track dust (UFO) events in DIII-D tokamak plasma shots. Built preprocessing, annotation masks, and YOLOv8 fine-tuning datasets, and analyzed temporal dust behavior across reactor components.

title: LaughTalk: Expressive 3D Talking-Head Generation with Laughter
description: LaughTalk is an expressive talking-head generation model that seamlessly handles both speech and laughter. It extends existing speech-driven methods to capture the distinct dynamics of laughter, generating comprehensive and realistic 3D facial animations.

title: Audio Representation Learning and Siamese Speaker Verification
description: Researched audio signal processing techniques including STFT and mel-spectrograms. Implemented CNN-based speaker classification and designed a Siamese verification model using contrastive learning.

title: Enhancing User Well-being Through an AI-Based Healing Service
description: Developed an AI-based healing service to enhance user well-being. Presented at the Korean Society of Information Processing Conference.
